_sText:
=====General Information=====
Name: ba_stadium
Game: Counter-Strike: Source
Author: Matt Willow Denton
Author Email: iammatt@gmail.com
Website: http://www.hl2-dev.com
Version: 1.0

=====Map Information========
Program: Valve Hammer Editor 4.0
Textures Used:  Standard HL2/CSS Textures
Build Time:  2 Hours
Compiler:  Standard Valve Hammer Editor Map Compiling Tools
Compile Time:  4 Minutes 57 Seconds

             Compile Computer Specs
CPU:     AMD Barton 2500+
RAM:     1024 MB Crucial PC2700 DDR
HDD:     120GB Seagate SATA
GFX:      Nvidia FX5900XT

======Other Information=====
ba_stadium is a Battle Arena map for Counter Strike Source.  This specific Battle Arena map takes place in a large stadium.
There are various walls and dividers around the map for cover, along with numerous cars.  Battle Arena maps focus on
fast gameplay, frantic firefights, and close knit teamwork to kill the other team as quick as possible.  Be sure to check
out other upcoming Battle Arena maps from us!

==Installation Instructions=
Extract the file "ba_stadium.bsp" and place it in your Counter Strike Source map directory.  The following is an example
 of where it may go: "C:\Program Files\Steam\Steam Apps\xxxx@xxx.xxx\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps".
